name: Fruits Jam Factory
description:
This is a juice factory simulation game, the goal is to earn $2000 if your money is below -$20 game over.

=======================================

Steps to make your own first juice!

  1.  Left-click fruit on the left panel to buy fruits, right-click to check the properties of the fruit.
  2. Click on the hammer to break the fruit into skin and pulp. (Grape and strawberry are pulp already, don't need to be hammered)
  3. Use the blower to wind off fruits skins. Drag the button on the right or use the up key and down key to adjust the blower power. 
  4. Finally, click Blend to mix up the juice. When bottled juice comes out, you will see the report of the juice, left click to sell it.

=======================================

Tips for Make Profitable Juice

  • If the sweet or sour number is close to 5 it will make the juice tasty and sell for considerable money. 
  • If skins were blended, it reduce the purity of juice and lower the selling price significantly. 
  • The more fruits used the more expensive the juice will be, different fruits have different sourness, sweetness, and costs.

Other

  • If the hammer is used on fruit pulp it will become squashed and will be wind off by blower.
  • Grape and strawberry don't have skin, they are pulp already. under this case hammer it will directly become quashed.
  • Using any machine will cost money too.
